column5: That is one of coolest gestures I have heard in a long time. Sorry if I affended anyone with the photo of the OOS fish that was not my intention. Anyway no harsh feelings toward anyone.  Tight Lines and Happy Fishing to All

I had a smokin', drinkin', gamblin' father in law, a great guy, who told me that leaping to conclusions was the only exercise he got   . The booze and cigs got him unfortunately and he died at 55, of throat cancer (but not before I made some money with him on NFL games).
Love means you never have to say you're sorry... (Love Story....'70's)   I LOVE ALL  YOU GUYS....
Group hug, GROUP HUG!
Good, now can we get back to the things that matter. Trashing hockey teams, pick-up truck brands, tiller v console.
Don't forget pickeral and walleye.
Nice!
We might have stumbled upon a freak Kool-Aid recipe that'll put the mods out of work. Everyone's apologizing and hugging!
Man hug. Chests touch, hips don't, two slaps on the back, no eye contact. Two seconds tops.
TUNDRA'S RULE.........and if you don't agree....You tell her....but be prepared to RUN....
Did you put somethin in the forum Roy?  I heard about things like that. Jesse Ventura did a show on it last month
C'mon everybody, sing along!   <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8F1VzJWU0lM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Yeah Mike sing it! Here, sing this one! I have tears in my eyes here.  <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/yCP2YV6Jge0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Thanks Roy, that image will be impossible to erase from my brain now.
Interesting....i just discovered Im a homophobe  ...thanks Roy...if you have 4 flat tires in the morning ....it wasnt me
Try brain bleach...it worked for me.
hahahahahahah omg ron thats hilarious! and FISHHERO im very happy you accept my apology tight lines and good fishing for 2012!!
this calls for a round of shots
Ya, tetanus shots.........
"Hillary" is lookin great BB! HH
Hillary is a damn ugly....Tundra is a PURDY PUPPY....
THANKS Sinclair......now all she has to do is bring back the DUCKS or I'll take her back....LOL...not really.....my wife has spoiled her rotten....
Good job Oakvillebassguy. Admitting you made a mistake and apologizing.......... You da man !

I wanna apologize to fishhero and anyone else that i had offended yesterday. I was 100% out of line with what I said and defiantly should have just simply reminded him about the OOS "pic rule" instead of being an  about this whole situation.  I never try to be a tough guy but sometimes my emotions get the better of me (especially when it comes to fishin).  I have come to a realization that all of us on this amazing forum share a passion for one of our countries greatest past-times, and based of that alone we should all get along.    Once again i sincerely apologize to you FISHHERO, you did not deserve that at all.  Mike
Very cool. Good on ya Mike.
Good on ya Oakvillebassguy, verty cool.
Class act Mike!!!I salute you.
Atta Boy !!
I would like Thread titles with the name Fishero in them for 300 Alex  Good deal Oakey---we all have bad days
That's pretty cool, Mike. The view is always better from the high road...
Good show kid!  We all get hot under the collar once in a while (I know I've done it on more then one occasion, lol)
Didn't see the Post but good on you for Stepping up & taking the high road Thanx & Tight Lines SBK
NICE!!!!!!! I take back my pm   shun off
Good on ya OBG. Been there done that and apologised to Mercman and Musky Mike for it   It's all good now. Warm fuzzies for everyone. GROUP HUG:thumbsup_anim:
way to  man up i am sure everyone appreciates your conviction and passion for the sport just we all get carried away sometimes
kudos
Good On Ya
Nice job OBG!

if everyone played nice all the time this would be one boring place......LOL   we all have had times where we jump to quick or go too far.......even me....that's life  but very big of you to post this  you da man..........
A big man just walked back thru the door.  Art
No harm no foul. Made for an interesting discussion if you ask me!

Just have to think first before posting,I've done it myself,but no more. Fishing is the passion here which we all love. Delicate criticism is warranted some times as long it's not ignorant or deliberate Good going OBG.
EDITED TO SAY SORRY......CLICKED WHEN I SHOULDA CLACKED  WRONG THREAD
LTF
Thanx Mike....I knew you had it in ya !
